actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Energy and Power.

official_title: A bill to permit changes in the maximum lawful price for the sale of the old Outer Continental Shelf natural gas.

summary.text: Amends the Natural Gas Policy Act of 1978 to authorize the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission to prescribe a maximum lawful price other than the maximum lawful statutory price for the first sale of certain natural gas if such price is just and reasonable under the Natural Gas Act.

titles.title: A bill to permit changes in the maximum lawful price for the sale of the old Outer Continental Shelf natural gas.
